desc.p: Record key.
The bank date that the first Entitlement Pre confirmation advice was sent.
No Input field.
Standard T24 Date field.
The message type generated by the delivery process.
Message types are defined on the relevant EB.ADVICES record.
The key to EB.ADVICES is defined as follows ACTIVITY.CODE-DIARY.EVENT.TYPE
Several message type may be defined for the same activity.
No Input field
Multi valued associated with Activity Code and Delivery Ref.
The activity code relating to the advice.
For pre confirmation advices the following codes are possible.
SC-0100 Pre advice initiation
SC-0101 Pre advice amendment or deletion
No Input Field
Multi valued field associated with message type and delivery ref.
User responsbile for creating the record.
The date and time that the record was created.
No Input Field.
The delivery reference of the advice generated by the delivery process for the associated message type.
The information, which is handed off to delivery can be viewed via the enquiry DE.HANDOFF.DETS.
No Input field
Multi valued associated with Activity Code and Delivery Ref.
